transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Hanji. Hanji.
Executive: Devesh.
Customer: Hanji Devesh baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Vikram baat kar raha hu Rajasthan Natural Stone se.
Executive: Kis company se?
Customer: Rajasthan Natural Stone.
Executive: Okay okay line par hiye mai aapko profile open kar raha hu. Rajasthan.

Executive: Hanji Vikram ji baat kar rahe hai?
Customer: Vikram baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Ji ji good morning. Kaise hai aap?
Customer: Good morning.
Customer: Maine ek suno bhai maine ek complaint raise kiya tha.
Executive: Hanji bataiye.
Customer: Aur us complaint ko raise kiye hue ho gaye bhai aaj 12 din ho gaye.
Executive: Jo aapko bata rahe the add karne ke liye kuch.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: To uska koi resolve time hai ya fir pura session pura saal nikal denge aap log resolve karne me.
Executive: Sir maine aapko whatsapp pe shayad connect bhi kiya tha.
Customer: Connect pichle char mahine se mai ho raha hu IndiaMART se aaj tak resolve nahi hua hai.
Executive: Sir wo aapki location ka jo jo aap bata rahe the na wo aadmi jo link bheja tha mujhe wo aapki location se related tha to wo waha pe sir location add nahi hogi.
Customer: Are dada location me google profile aap logo ne ek video bheja tha video dekh ke aap batao na link kaha se uthana hai sir mujhe.
Customer: Aap jaha se video bhej rahe ho video dekh ke bhi mai link copy karke de raha hu tab bhi nahi kar pa rahe ho aap log har bar wahi baat aap log kar rahe ho mere sath.
Customer: Senior se baat kara do senior bhi bolta hai ki bhai jaha isme to working kar rahe hai do din me ho jayega usko aapko bhi 15 din ho gaye.
Executive: Sir jo aapki complaint thi maine senior se bhi baat kara di thi aur upar jo backend team hai usko bhi bol diya tha aapki complaint raise ho gayi thi fir iske baad sir maine aapko number bhi shayad senior ke diya tha unse baat karne ke liye. To un senior se aapki kya baat hui thi unhone kya aap bola tha ki kya bhai unhone mail circulate kar diya hai unhone mail circulate kar diya aaj tak resolve nahi hua unhone bola aap kam kar rahe hai ho jayega aaj tak nahi hua.
Customer: To koi complaint agar ek minute meri baat pehle aap sun lo. Hanji wahi complaint agar raise hota hai aapka ye kam nahi hai ki aap mujhe senior ke number de do aapka kam hai aap mere representative ho to aapka kam hai follow up leke isko close karana.
Executive: Ji ji bilkul bilkul.
Customer: To aap kyu nahi kara pa rahe?
Executive: Kyuki jo aapne link diya tha usko maine add karne ka koshish kiya lekin yaha se add nahi ho pa raha hai. Mai mere side se. Bataiye to bataiye kaha se kaun sa link uthana hai duniya me sabke google account add ho rahe hai. Kaun sa link de rahe hai aur mai kaun sa de raha hu.
Executive: Jo aapne wo link mujhe wo link bheja tha wo shayad aapki location ka link tha.
Customer: Are sir google page ka bhi mai do bar de chuka hu uske baad.
Executive: Google page ka jo aapne link mujhe bheja tha us jagah me check kar raha hu. Rajasthan.

Customer: Aap mail me ho na aap batao ye jo ticket number hai 9615074 ye kab close hoga?
Executive: Kaun sa sir ticket number?
Customer: Ticket aap logo ne raise kiya hai na 9615074.
Executive: 9615074 right sir?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Mail me bhi ho mail kitni tarikh ko hua hai aap check karo.
Executive: Ji ji mai check kar raha hu.
Executive: 2910 ko mail raise hua hai aaj hum 171 me baithe hai.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: To iska koi solution hai ya nahi hai nahi hai to aap log mana karo na ki nahi hoga.
Executive: Solution ke liye sir maine aapki kafi der tak senior se baat karai thi unse aapki kya baat hui thi mujhe aap batayenge maine to ek bar fir se discuss karke batata hu. Senior wahi do din ki kehta hai do din me ho jata hai mai samajh raha hu aap log mail mail khel rahe ho to mai bhi mail mail hi khelta hu abhi mail hi dalta hu.
Customer: Aapko nahi pata ki aapko nahi pata ki aapke client ka jo jiske aapki responsibility hai uska kuch ticket number resolve nahi hua to aapne kyu nahi baat kari senior se ki sir wo ticket close nahi hua. Maine
Executive: Maine baat ki thi maine unse discussion bhi kiya tha dekhiye. Unhone aapko unhone link link bheja hai wo link add nahi ho raha hai wo link sir backend team ki side se add hota hai. Aur wo link hamari side se aapne pucha nahi kaun sa link chahiye mujhe. Maine aapse pucha sir whatsapp pe aap check kariye kai bar pucha hai.
Customer: Maine aapko reply nahi kiya hai?
Executive: Maine aapko dekhiye uske baad 6 tarikh ko bhi puch aapse bola sir actually mai ghar par hu maine aapne bola chutti par hu mai aapko maine aapko number diya tha fir sir inse sir se kya baat hui thi aap mujhe batayenge?
Customer: Maine aapko bola tha na ki sir se mai kyu baat karunga yaar aap log baat karo aap chutti pe aapne wapas kab join kiya aapne usko follow up liya?
Executive: Ji follow up liya maine.
Customer: To kya bola aapke senior ne aap mujhe batao mere se kyu puch rahe ho unhone aap batao unhone ye bol unhone ye bola ki ha maine isko kiya tha lekin wo link add nahi hua hai.
Customer: Add nahi ho pa raha hai jo aapne link diya solution.
Executive: Solution sir mai puch ke abhi batata hu aur kya ho sakta hai aage iska. Aaj maine phone kiya aapko iski batayenge. Kya hai yaar aise nahi hota Devesh ji kam ticket raise kar rakha hai koi ticket ka koi matlab hai ki nahi aapke yaha jo ticket lete ki koi time table hai ki nahi kitne time tak usko close karna hai. 24 ghante 48 ghante india me aisi koi company nahi hai jo 20 din leta hai ticket close karne me aap logo ne apne end pe close kar rakha hai mujhe ye batao.
Executive: Nahi sir hum apne end pe kaise close kar sakte hai koi ticket. To aap log nahi kar sakte ho to ye jo aaj 20 din se pending pada hai iska responsible person kaun hai?
Executive: Responsible person sir hum hi log hai aur sir kaun ho sakta hai. To aap ho gaye to kya aapne koi action liya aapne koi mail jo aap le sakte the.
Executive: Sir wo ji jo jo mai le sakta tha sir mai wo kar sakta tha maine kiya tha. Mail dala maine maine aapko jo complaint thi aapne senior tak pahucha di. Koi return me hai mail kiya aapne senior ko return me hai mail kar rakha hai aapne.
Executive: Sir senior bilkul bagal me baithe hai unko mail kaise kar sakte hai maine unko aapka mail nahi karoge dada to wo mana bagal me baith kar baat kara do abhi baat kara do. Abhi mai baat karaunga sir wo actually me ek meeting le rahe hai. Mai bhi panch minute hote hai mai aapki meeting me sirf yahi dekhte hai aap log ki sale kaise karte hai usko service kya deni hai wo nahi dekhte aap log.
Executive: Sir ye Devesh ji mai bhi corporate ka banda pehle hua karta tha. Thik hai. Ji ji. Aisa nahi hai ki mai direct idhar aake baitha hu to mujhe pata hai ki kaise kam ko ignore kiya jata hai aur kaise kam ko proceed kiya jata hai. Nahi nahi bilkul ignore nahi ho raha hai sir aap ye galat samajh rahe hai. Aap aap ye batao aap ye batao isme customer ki kaha problem hai aaj jo mera ye char mahine se add nahi hua hai iski wajah se mera agar ek bhi convert hone wala lead mujhe nahi mil paya jo customer mere pass pahunch sakta tha wo nahi pahuncha to uske liye koi hai jo uska jo uske loss mujhe hue hai uske liye bharpai kar sake. Koi nahi hai. Hum ye cheeze kyu link karte hai apne account se. Mai hakikat badh sake na. Hum log jo ye add karte hai iska purpose kya hota hai ki customer ko humne bahut sare sources diye hai wo kahi se bhi connect hoke hamare pass aa sakta hai. Bilkul bilkul. Ye jo connect connect hona tha wo nahi ho paya uske liye kaun zimmedar hai. Zimmedar to hum hi log hai lekin sir wo jo aapne link diya tha wo actually me add waha se add karne ki koshish kari thi. Are dada mai to day one se baitha hu mai day one se baitha hu aap logo se kitni bar keh chuka hu ki kaha se kya link karna hai aap VC kar lete ho hamare sath VC me batao mai aapko system bhi link pe de deta hu mai system bhi de deta hu aap khud se nikal lo kaun sa link chahiye aapko. To kyu nahi kar pate aap. Sir ye mera mai servicing team se hu actually me thik hai ye backend team ka kam hai mai dekho mai mai window mera window person aap ho aap ye responsibility apne palle se nahi ja sakte ki mai dusra team se hu ye dusri team ka kam hai mere liye window person aap ho mere side pe aapka number dikhta hai aapki shakal dikhti hai. Ji bilkul bilkul backend me kaun kam kar raha hai. Ji ji ji aap samajh rahe ho na ji bilkul bilkul mai samajh raha hu aapki jo problem hai lekin sir jo jo mai kar sakta tha apne end pe mai maine wo kiya na aapke liye. Aap aapne kaha kiya hai mujhe kya pata sir aapne senior se baat kari ki nahi aapne mail karke mujhe CC me rakha aapne apne customer ko CC me rakha kya ki aap apna kam puri imandari se kar rahe ho verbal ka koi zamana nahi hai aapko pata hai na bhaiyo me batwara hota hai na sabko pata hai bhai bhai ke liye jaan deta hai par jab registry hoti hai na to sign dono ke hote hai. Bilkul bilkul. To wo cheeze aapne kari aapne mail kiya mail pe mujhe rakha CC me. Sir maine jo aapka case tha wo senior ko de diya tha ab uska jo mai wahi keh raha hu aapne senior ko mail diya to uska koi proof hai aapke pass aapne mujhe CC me rakha hai. Directly maine sir aapko number diya tha baat karne ke liye. Dada dekho verbal cheeze alag hoti hai aap bar bar jo cheez keh rahe ho aap samajh nahi pa rahe ho mai jo kehna chah raha hu. Sir directly maine number diya tha jo person abhi aapke sath discuss kar raha hu. Dada number dene se kya hota hai mai google marunga na to India mart ke sabse senior adhikari ka number aa jayega mai usse baat karke kya karunga agar aap se deal nahi ho raha to aapko mera representative kyu banaya gaya hai. Why are you appointed for me? Aap ho na window person ki sir aapko koi dikkat ho aap is bande se baat karna samajh rahe hai na jitne bhi client aapke andar me diye gaye honge company ne kya bol ke diya hai ki bhaiya iske sath koi samasya ho to Devesh aap dekho. Aaj to sir mai aapka Devesh nahi dekh raha hai yaar Devesh kya kar raha hai direct number de dega sir mai chutti pe hu senior se baat kar lo. Maine sir bata diya tha aapne bata diya ki aap senior se baat karai thi. Maine aapki baat karai thi koi baat nahi mujhe pata hai mujhe kam kaise nikalwana hai thik hai Devesh ji mai aaj dekho aaj aap logo ki mai rail laga deta hu feel karta hu mai badhiya tarike se sath sath mail draft karta hu aap logo se resolve nahi ho raha hai na ab mai khud karwa lunga isko. Okay sir thank you. Thank you Devesh.
summary:
Concerns:

- Complaint not resolved even after 12 days.

- Location not added to Google profile.

- Ticket not resolved even after 20 days.



Resolution:

- Executive said he will check and inform.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, google profile, ticket, resolution
